about_the_game:
Toyota Racing believes in giving back to their fans! This NASCAR Heat 2 – December Toyota Pack is FREE, and it includes some top-tier Toyota Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, NASCAR XFINITY Series, and NASCAR Camping World Truck Series paint schemes! In total, you'll get 14 new Toyota paint schemes and 1 new Toyota challenge.

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Matt Kenseth #20 DEWALT Finale (Homestead)
Martin Truex Jr. #78 BPS Ducks Unlimited (Bristol)
…
NXS:
Daniel Suarez #18 Comcast / Juniper (Chicagoland)
Matt Tifft #19 Fanatics (New Hampshire)
…
CWTS:
Ryan Truex #19 AISIN (Chicagoland)
Myatt Snider #51 Liberty Tax Service (Kentucky)

name: NASCAR Heat 2 - Free December Toyota Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better

esrb.descriptors: Online Interactions not Rated by ESRB
